techmeme.title: Sources: Verizon plans to cut ~15,000 jobs, its largest workforce reduction ever, and transition ~200 stores into franchised operations, seeking to cut costs (Wall Street Journal)
LinkedIn rolls out AI-powered people search to premium users in the US, with plans to expand it to other countries in the coming months (TechCrunch)
Google DeepMind unveils SIMA 2, a video-game-playing agent built on Gemini to navigate and solve problems in 3D virtual worlds like Goat Simulator 3 (Will Douglas Heaven/MIT Technology Review)
Sources: xAI has raised $15B, adding $5B to the $10B reported in September, which valued the startup at $200B (Samantha Subin/CNBC)
Salesforce buys Doti AI for $100M; the Israeli startup raised $7M and its Work AI tool lets enterprises securely access and use internal knowledge in real time (Meir Orbach/CTech)
